input_text:
Job Title: Artificial Intelligence Specialist

Location: Fort Lauderdale, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Company DescriptionBlue Interactive Agency is an innovative and forward-thinking internet marketing company located in Fort Lauderdale, FL. Our mission is to empower our clients by providing comprehensive internet marketing solutions at competitive prices. As our client's strategic online partner, we specialize in various areas such as online marketing data analysis, project management, search engine optimization, social media marketing, and more.
Role SummaryAs an AI Specialist at Blue Interactive, you will be responsible for developing and implementing AI-driven strategies to enhance our digital marketing campaigns. Your expertise in machine learning, natural language processing, and predictive analytics will help us tailor content, optimize media spending, and improve customer engagement through personalized experiences.
Key ResponsibilitiesDevelop and deploy machine learning models to predict customer behaviors and preferences, enhancing personalized marketing efforts.Utilize AI to optimize search engine marketing (SEM) and programmatic advertising campaigns.Implement natural language processing tools to analyze social media trends and customer feedback, helping shape content strategy.Collaborate with the data analytics team to interpret data, ensure accuracy in data-driven decisions, and improve campaign performance.Innovate and experiment with new AI technologies that can be leveraged within digital marketing to keep the agency at the cutting edge.Work closely with the creative and strategy teams to integrate AI technologies seamlessly into broader marketing campaigns.Provide insights and reports on the effectiveness of AI-driven initiatives and make recommendations for further enhancements.Stay current with the latest trends in AI, machine learning, and digital marketing technologies, sharing knowledge and best practices with the team.
QualificationsBachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.Proven experience in machine learning, data mining, statistical modeling, and AI technologies.Strong programming skills in Python, R, or similar languages.Experience with AI frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).Familiarity with digital marketing platforms and understanding of digital marketing metrics and KPIs.Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities.Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across different teams.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Artificial Intelligence Specialist
output_json.summary: Blue Interactive Agency seeks an AI Specialist to develop and implement AI-driven strategies for digital marketing campaigns.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field
required_skills: Proven experience in machine learning, data mining, statistical modeling, and AI technologies
Strong programming skills in Python, R, or similar languages
Experience with AI frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
Familiarity with digital marketing platforms and understanding of digital marketing metrics and KPIs
job_responsibilities: Develop and deploy machine learning models to predict customer behaviors and preferences
Optimize search engine marketing (SEM) and programmatic advertising campaigns
Implement natural language processing tools to analyze social media trends and customer feedback
Collaborate with the data analytics team to interpret data and improve campaign performance
Innovate and experiment with new AI technologies
Integrate AI technologies into broader marketing campaigns
Provide insights and reports on AI-driven initiatives
Stay current with AI, machine learning, and digital marketing trends
output_json.company_information: Blue Interactive Agency is an internet marketing company located in Fort Lauderdale, FL, specializing in internet marketing solutions.

other.content: Company DescriptionBlue Interactive Agency is an innovative and forward-thinking internet marketing company located in Fort Lauderdale, FL. Our mission is to empower our clients by providing comprehensive internet marketing solutions at competitive prices. As our client's strategic online partner, we specialize in various areas such as online marketing data analysis, project management, search engine optimization, social media marketing, and more.
